abstracts.cdata!:
The First Technical Assistance Project
            will comprise: (a) about 10 man-years of long term advisory
            services to strengthen the Government's planning and
            statistical services and project preparation; (b) about 150
            man-months of short and medium term consultancies (i) to
            undertake preinvestment and feasibility studies and prepare
            projects for financing, and (ii) conduct special studies
            related to project or policy implementation.
